targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  avg_len
FROM twitter_dailystats_groups
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  fetched_tweets_count
FROM twitter_dailystats_groups
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  followers_count
FROM twitter_dailystats_groups
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  avg_retweets
FROM twitter_dailystats_groups
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  avg_likes
FROM twitter_dailystats_groups
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  name AS metric,
  avg_replies
FROM twitter_dailystats_groups
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  followers_count
FROM twitter_dailystats_groups
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  name = '$group_name'
ORDER BY date

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  fetched_tweets_count
FROM twitter_dailystats_groups
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  name = '$group_name'
ORDER BY date

ORDER BY date
